page.title: 09GAMES PLAYED AT BAUMBER.
page.content: HORSES is played with a skipping rope. One person holds both ends of the rope and another holds the rope which arches at the back,and you just run around pretending to be a horse. STUCK IN TH MUD is played usually with about ten or eleven children.If you get caught you have to stand with your legs open. You can play skipping with about up to ten children.Two people hold the rope and takes turns in skipping,you can play bumper car,I know a boy,teddy bear teddy bear, all in together girls one of the rymes is,I know a boy and he is double jointed you kissed him and made him disappointed. BUNNY HOLES is played with about ten or eleven children.If you get caught you put your arm against a wall or fence when someone goes under your arm you are free again
